plist.dict:
EnableBootArgs
Enabled
ProbGuard
Enabled
ProbGuardAllProcesses
Enabled
ZeroOnFree
Enabled
AllowInternalSecurityPolicy
DevelopmentPhase UnderDevelopment
SecureAllocator_SingleCluster
DevelopmentPhase UnderDevelopment
SecureAllocator_Nano
DevelopmentPhase #if TARGET_OS_IOS || TARGET_OS_VISION || TARGET_OS_OSX FeatureComplete #else UnderDevelopment #endif
SecureAllocator_NanoOnXzone
DevelopmentPhase UnderDevelopment
SecureAllocator_ThreadCaching
DevelopmentPhase #if TARGET_OS_IOS || TARGET_OS_VISION || TARGET_OS_OSX FeatureComplete #else UnderDevelopment #endif
#if TARGET_OS_OSX SecureAllocator_Intel
DevelopmentPhase UnderDevelopment
#endif
#if TARGET_OS_IOS || TARGET_OS_VISION || TARGET_OS_OSX || TARGET_OS_WATCH #define HAS_SECURE_ALLOCATOR_PROCESS_FEATURES 1 #define SECURE_ALLOCATOR_SYSTEMWIDE_ENABLED 1 #else #define HAS_SECURE_ALLOCATOR_PROCESS_FEATURES 0 #define SECURE_ALLOCATOR_SYSTEMWIDE_ENABLED 0 #endif
SecureAllocator_SystemWide
DevelopmentPhase #if SECURE_ALLOCATOR_SYSTEMWIDE_ENABLED FeatureComplete #else UnderDevelopment #endif
#if HAS_SECURE_ALLOCATOR_PROCESS_FEATURES #define SECURE_ALLOCATOR_PROCESS_FEATURE(name, state) \ SecureAllocator_process_##name \ \ DevelopmentPhase \ state \
#if TARGET_OS_VISION SECURE_ALLOCATOR_PROCESS_FEATURE(arkitd, FeatureComplete) SECURE_ALLOCATOR_PROCESS_FEATURE(backboardd, FeatureComplete) SECURE_ALLOCATOR_PROCESS_FEATURE(wakeboardd, FeatureComplete) SECURE_ALLOCATOR_PROCESS_FEATURE(realitycamerad, FeatureComplete) #endif
SECURE_ALLOCATOR_PROCESS_FEATURE(aegirposter, UnderDevelopment) SECURE_ALLOCATOR_PROCESS_FEATURE(CollectionsPoster, UnderDevelopment)
#if TARGET_OS_OSX SECURE_ALLOCATOR_PROCESS_FEATURE(VTEncoderXPCService, UnderDevelopment) #endif
#if TARGET_OS_WATCH SECURE_ALLOCATOR_PROCESS_FEATURE(backboardd, UnderDevelopment) SECURE_ALLOCATOR_PROCESS_FEATURE(ClockFace, UnderDevelopment) #endif #endif
